bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for the Evaluation of 802.11 Wireless Performance
IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for the Evaluation of 802.11 Wireless Performance
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P802.11.2/D1.01, Feb 2008

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Recommended practices for evaluating and measuring the performance of IEEE Std 802.11 Wireless Local Area Network (WLAN) devices and networks at the component and application level are described. A set of performance metrics, measurement methodologies and test conditions are provided that enable such measurements to be made and permit prediction of the performance of installed WLAN devices and networks.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
